To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private ThreeWhiteSoldiers _threewhitesoldiers;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_threewhitesoldiers = ThreeWhiteSoldiers(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_threewhitesoldiers.IsReady)
{
    var current = _threewhitesoldiers.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.threewhitesoldiers = self.ThreeWhiteSoldiers(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.threewhitesoldiers.IsReady:
    current = self.threewhitesoldiers.Current.Value
